name: Last Minute Train
description:
Rush through the train station to tell your crush what you really think about them. Get to the train they're about to leave in as soon as possible!

What you want to tell them? ...you can think about that later. 

Soundtrack Credits

Game Design, Programming, Art: Nevis

Music, Sound Design, Testing: Yän

Controls

Space or Enter to advance text

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Escape to close the game

Win Build supports Gamepad (left stick to move, 'a' button to advance text)

Versions

WebGL is the jam version.

"LastMinuteTrain.zip" is the downloadable windows jam executable.

"LastMinuteTrain_PostJamVersion.zip" includes some visual changes and bug fixes I made after the jam. Play this to finally talk to Max!...?
